Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.14.0
Entries.Description: It's almost 8 months since last update of Tower Collector. During that time many private matters occupied almost all of my spare time. I plan to come back to more active development soon. Meanwhile OpenCellID database has been acquired by Unwired Labs which become new maintainer. I wish them good luck and hope they will cooperate with OCID community as ENAiKOON did for couple of years!
Messages: Updated API key validation rule to support new OCID format.

Entries.Title: Don't miss the chance!
Entries.Description:
Don't let the others decide, have influence - vote for your most wanted features!

Join Tower Collector community on Facebook or Google+ to get updated :)

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.13.0
Entries.Description: Join Tower Collector community on Facebook or Google+ to get help and share your ideas :)
Messages: Improved app performance and shortened startup time.
Fixed formatting issue in CSV files when GPS altitude over 1000 m.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.12.0
Entries.Description: Join Tower Collector community on Facebook (new!) or Google+ to get help and share your ideas :)
Messages: Added export to CSV using OpenCellID.org values formatting (can be uploaded on website).
Added option to hide Collector notification from lock screen and status bar unless expanded on Android 4.1+.
Improved auto update source selection to open app market if possible and then website.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.11.0
Messages: Added number of main and neighboring cells to main screen.
